jobTitle: Cloud and IT Transformation - Enterprise Architect - Senior Associate
jobDescription:
We believe that challenges are better solved together. That's why you'll join a diverse, global community of solvers - an unexpected mix of people that come together to build trust in society and solve important problems. With us, you are encouraged to lead with your heart and values, and where your unique skills are developed and put to work in unexpected and exciting ways, superpowered by technology.
At PwC South East Asia Consulting, we help businesses to work smarter and grow faster. We partner with our clients to build effective organisations, innovate and grow, reduce costs, manage risk and regulation and, leverage talent. Our aim is to support businesses in designing, managing and executing lasting beneficial change.
PwC’s South East Asia Consulting practice provides a comprehensive range of professional services and experience to deliver large scale, cross territory transformation projects, wherever our clients need us to be – from strategy through to execution.

About the TeamAs an Enterprise Architect you will gain exposure to:• Business Development – You will be responsible for the specification, design, cost and proposal of cloud and IT solutions to meet formal client requirements. Experience and evidence of architecting and leading delivery of complex cloud projects must be a core capability.• Project delivery - you will have the opportunity to lead the technical architecture stream of project delivery to review, define and implement enterprise architecture strategies, frameworks and transformation roadmaps.
About the Role
To work with client team and key stakeholders to execute engagement sprints with exceptional status reportingTo identify risks, undertake root cause analysis, build mitigation plan around it and seek support in appropriate forums to ensure delivery and outcome parametersTo work withCIO Advisory leadership in practice development through:Development of Microsoft Dynamics CRM, proof of concepts (POC) in advanced stages in terms of pre sales to implementation stages.Development of go-to-market strategies, white papers, etc.Assisting in managing vendor alliances, other PwC teams in Singapore/SEA Continually collaborate with other Technology Consulting functions and across Lines of Service to foster innovation, efficiency and holistic solutions for our clientsTo be successful in this role, you will need to demonstrate:Strong understanding of Microsoft Dynamics 365,Dynamics Business central or FNO Experience of providing Pre-Sales Demonstrations Experience of working on full life cycle implementations across multiple versions of Dynamics CRM/365Consulting mindset with systematic thinkingBusiness Analysis and understanding client needsBusiness Acumen across one or more industries/ functionsClear and impactful presentation skillsAbility to work with unpredictability and loosely defined problemsAbility to interact and collaborate effectively and professionallySelf-motivated with minimal need for executive steerPassion to work with, learn from and mentor teams with varying skill sets, background, and geographical locations
About you 
Minimum 5 - 6 years of relevant experience, preferably with a consulting or technology firmUnderstanding of the principles, implications and design considerations of the underlying platform aspects of Dynamics 365 solutions.Deep understanding of the methods and tools used to customize and extend Dynamics 365 solutionsA strong passion for Dynamics 365 and associated Microsoft technologiesProven project experience of implementing Dynamics 365 solutions either in industry or for a consulting company.Able to demonstrate the ability to research and analyse pertinent client, industry, and technical mattersPossess strong problem-solving skills and able to prioritise and manage multiple tasksStrong interpersonal and stakeholder management skills with ability to coordinate between technical and business teamsExcellent verbal, written communication and interpersonal skills with stakeholders at all levelsDemonstrated project management experience by handling multiple projects simultaneously Able to interact with various levels of internal and external stakeholders both in written and verbal forms

Overview

Rubrik, the Zero Trust Data Security Company, delivers data security and operational resilience for enterprises and is one of the fastest growing companies in Silicon Valley. Rubrik provides data security and data protection on a single platform, including Zero Trust Data Protection, Ransomware Investigation, Incident Containment, Sensitive Data Discovery, and Orchestrated Application Recovery. Enterprises depend on Rubrik to simplify backup and recovery, accelerate cloud adoption, enable automation at scale, and secure against cyberthreats. Rubrik has been recognized as a Gartner Leader, and both a Forbes Cloud 100 Company and LinkedIn Top Startup, three years in a row.

Who You Are

You are a leader who thrives in a dynamic environment and has a track record of cloud technology alliance partnership, cloud partner sales, and business development responsibility. You will be responsible for our strategic cloud partnership across APAC and be accountable to develop a world-class joint GTM partnership, as well as lead a world-class sales motion, that aligns to the cloud partner programs and to Rubrik’s success.

Your job owns, builds, and drives the GTM with cloud alliances for the Asia-Pacific region. You will be in high demand and this role requires a strong individual who brings a ton of empathy while holding the line on sales targets. Provide enough structure to bring about prioritization of work that has the biggest impact for Rubrik’s customers while empowering of our sales teams to deliver beyond our customers’ expectations.

Responsibilities
Lead Rubrik’s strategic GTM with cloud partners, including development of regional business plans that contributes in a meaningful way to Rubrik’s growth targets and executes strategic pathways to market. Responsible for cloud partner enablement to position and sell the value of Rubrik. Strong understanding of cloud partner vision, product suites, and APAC leadership structure and sales models.Engage directly in the sales cycle as a Subject Matter Expert on joint ‘must win’ pursuits/opportunities, facilitating incremental joint sales with cloud partnerships in APAC.Drive incremental Pipeline Generation activities directly and through the Rubrik and cloud partner selling ecosystems, including joint Channel and SI partners.Drive joint sales pursuits in targeted accounts to drive field interlock and joint pursuit planning, resulting in cloud partner sourced Net New ACV and New Logos.Strong executive presence & track record of consistent quota attainment & over achievement. Be resilient and embody servant leadership teamwork to “create the weather” with joint Sales teams. Lead collaboration with joint Marketing teams to build and execute joint demand generation plans (Partner Prospecting Days, CxO Roundtables and joint events).Ensure Alliance operational rigor, consistency, and business review governance with executive stakeholders from regional partners.As new cloud solutions are launched, lead the regional GTM launches with Rubrik and cloud partners, including new solution enablement, regional GTM readiness and collaborating on joint event plans.As the regional voice of the cloud business unit, provide customer and sales team Product feedback to Rubrik on current solutions and new feature requests.
Requirements
Proven track record of leading new business model GTM, thought leadership, partner selling, creating repeatable processes with standardized KPI measurement, and managing through change and scale, with sales/presentation excellence. Ability to Engage at CxO/RVP level with cloud partners to drive top-down support for joint GTMProven ability to coach partner teams on opportunity discovery, identifying pain, and opening new business together from incubation/startup through scaled business.Fast learner and self-starter who is comfortable taking action and driving results despite ambiguity, prioritizing diverse work with cross-functional teams, and maintaining velocity at regional GTM success.Strong operational command of business including written/verbal communication, organizational skills, and proficiency in various business tools (XLS/SFDC/Teams/etc).10+ years of experience in Technology Sales and/or Alliances with at least 5 years managing partnership with Cloud Partners (Microsoft, Google or AWS) across APAC region.Bachelor’s Degree (required) or MBA (preferred), with Business, Computer Science, Engineering or equivalent experience.
About Rubrik

Rubrik, the Zero Trust Data Security Company™, delivers data security and operational resilience for enterprises. Rubrik’s big idea is to provide data security and data protection on a single platform, including Zero Trust Data Protection, Ransomware Investigation, Incident Containment, Sensitive Data Discovery, and Orchestrated Application Recovery. This means your data is ready so you can recover the data you need, and avoid paying a ransom. Because when you secure your data, you secure your applications, and you secure your business.

We are a leader in data security, have been recognized as as a Forbes Cloud 100 Company and named as a LinkedIn Top 10 Startup. There has never been a more exciting time to join Rubrik, and our future is even brighter. The work you do will help propel our next chapter of growth as you do the best work of your career.

Linkedin | Twitter | Instagram | Rubrik.com | 

Diversity, Equity & Inclusion @ Rubrik: 

At Rubrik we are committed to building and sustaining a culture where people of all backgrounds are valued, know they belong, and believe they can succeed here.

Rubrik's goal is to hire and promote the best person for the job, no matter their background. In doing so, Rubrik is committed to correcting systemic processes and cultural norms that have prevented equal representation. This means we review our current efforts with the intent to offer fair hiring, promotion, and compensation opportunities to people from historically underrepresented communities, and strive to create a company culture where all employees feel they can bring their authentic selves to work and be successful.

Our DEI strategy focuses on three core areas of our business and culture:
Our Company: Build a diverse company that provides equitable access to growth and success for all employees globally. Our Culture: Create an inclusive environment where authenticity thrives and people of all backgrounds feel like they belong.Our Communities: Expand our commitment to diversity, equity, & inclusion within and beyond our company walls to invest in future generations of underrepresented talent and bring innovation to our clients.
Equal Opportunity Employer/Veterans/Disabled: Rubrik is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, or protected veteran status and will not be discriminated against on the basis of disability.

Rubrik provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability or genetics. In addition to federal law requirements, Rubrik complies with applicable state and local laws governing nondiscrimination in employment in every location in which the company has facilities. This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including recruiting, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation and training. 

Federal law requires employers to provide reasonable accommodation to qualified individuals with disabilities. Please contact us at hr@rubrik.com if you require a reasonable accommodation to apply for a job or to perform your job. Examples of reasonable accommodation include making a change to the application process or work procedures, providing documents in an alternate format, using a sign language interpreter, or using specialized equipment.

Would you like to be part of the most international company in the world? A company operating in more than 220 countries worldwide, and has been pioneering cross-border express shipping since 1969. Would you like to be part of a business that connects people across the globe? And the more we connect, the better life on Earth becomes. Do you want to make a difference? If you have answered Yes! to the above, join our Insanely Customer-Centric team now! For more information on DHL Express, please visit workingatdhl.com. 

 DHL Express Global Head Office has an opening for Principal System Specialist in the Customer Facing IT Domain. The key purpose of this role is to: 

 Manage and/or coordinate between several applications/products/services as part of the customer facing applications, including build and run elements to support optimum functioning of the business functions. Provide product and project oversight to ensure that project is delivered to agreed scope, time, cost, quality, governance and satisfaction, as per agreed roadmaps.  Provide technical oversight to ensure that changes are in line with architecture and are developed with highest quality standards for customer experience, performance and availability.  This is also a technical implementation role which focuses on delivering and administration of cloud-based contact center solutions. It supports business development activities by providing demos of contact center products. This position focuses on customer interaction applications that will developed/ implemented on a Cloud based Contact Centre as a Service (CCaaS).  This role may be changed to support the larger Electronic Shipping Solutions (ESS) domain and the associated products, if required.  

The best-fit candidate may be based in Europe, India (Chennai), Malaysia (KUL or CBJ) or Singapore. 

YOUR TASKS

 Work across business and service units and has cross domain level knowledge.  Support multiple business segments and work closely with Regional Customer Contact Centre Business Analysts. Responsible for the technical direction, oversight and implementation of cutting-edge Contact Center technologies such as IVR, Call Flow, Work Force Management, AI, Automation, call routing and authentication. Responsible for the overall design and play a key role in improving interaction between the business and IT by identifying and developing strategic contact center applications that leverage the advancement of the architecture roadmap through innovative solutions that future proof architecture.  Work with business functions to understand needs, priorities and issues to plan the associated IT roadmaps. Provide consultancy and support business on the customer facing web application development to improve overall customer experience through digitalization.  Drive techno-functional discussion in Omni Channel space enterprise wide. Accountable that projects are delivered to agreed time, cost, quality, governance and satisfaction. Ownership and resolution of issues reported on systems in production to ensure minimum business disruption. Manage external/internal IT resources engaged during the execution of a project. Work with DHL customers, suppliers or internal staff (at global/regional/functional levels).  Participate in global project teams based on role and involvement. Act as Global Business IT lead for global projects with full responsibility on the delivery side of the IT component. Sound understanding of various system integration requirements raised by internal stakeholders, customers and/or 3rd party solution providers. Take strong cross-functional ownership of specific business process areas and collaborate with domains on the development of roadmaps to achieve both tactical and strategic objectives.  Contribute to domain roadmaps. Manage successful implementation of solutions at an acceptable time, cost and quality. Provide regular reports of progress towards meeting project deliverables Lead, manage and monitor the direct and indirect project team members for the duration of the project.

jobTitle: Serverside R&D Engineer (Middle Platform Data), Video Infrastructure
jobDescription:
TikTok Video Infrastructure is a world-leading video platform that provides multi-media storage, delivery, transcoding, and streaming services. We are building the next generation video processing platform and the largest live streaming network, which provides excellent experiences for billions of users around the world.
Popular video products of TikTok are all empowered by our cutting-edge cloud technologies. Working in this team, you will have the opportunity to tackle challenges of large-scale networks all over the world, while leveraging your expertise in coding, algorithms, complexity analysis, and large-scale system design.
